Dapatkan MBA! 100% online, 100% di tanga: Get your MBA! 100% online, 100% on your terms!
Kejayaan di tangan anda, dengan program: Take control of your education with our flexible, fully online MBA program. Designed for working professionals, this course allows you to balance your studies with your career and personal life effortlessly.
1 Bulan, 1 Modul: Fokus secara intensif: One Month, One Module: Focus intensively on one module each month, making it easier to manage your time and absorb the material thoroughly.
Intake Setiap Bulan: Mulakan perjalanan: Monthly Intake: Start your MBA journey whenever you're ready with our convenient monthly enrollment options.
Bayaran Per Modul: Nikmati fleksibiliti: Pay Per Module: Enjoy the flexibility of paying for one module at a time with our competitive pricing.
Kemasukan Terus: Terbuka untuk graduan D: Direct Entry: Open to anyone with a degree, regardless of field of study.
Kemasukan APEL: Terbuka untuk graduan ST: APEL entry: Designed for individuals aged 30 and above, posses STPM or Diploma, with 5 years of work experience.
Kemasukan Micro Credentials: Tiada syara: Micro Credentials entry: No entry requirements, open to all.
Pengalaman 28 tahun dalam kepimpinan pen: Bringing 28 years of expertise in education leadership
Pakar dalam pengambilan pelajar, kecemer: Expert in recruitment, academic excellence, and institutional branding
Ahli Lembaga Penasihat untuk Education M: Advisory board member for Education Malaysia Global Service (EMGS)
Bersemangat dalam pendidikan berkualiti: Passionate about quality education and sustainable growth
Adakah program MBA sepenuhnya dalam tali: Is the MBA program fully online?
Ya, program MBA kami adalah sepenuhnya d: Yes, our MBA program is 100% online, allowing you to study from anywhere in the world at your convenience.
Berapa tempoh program MBA?: What is the duration of the MBA program?
Biasanya, program MBA kami boleh diseles: Typically, our MBA program can be completed in one year of flexible study, tailored for working professionals.
Apakah syarat kemasukan yang diperlukan?: Are there any specific admission requirements?
Untuk memohon, anda perlu memiliki ijaza: To apply, you'll need a bachelor's degree or equivalent (Direct Entry), or individuals aged 30 and above, possess STPM or Diploma, and a 5 years of work experience (APEL Entry). No entry requirements for (Micro Credentials Entry), open to everyone! Specific details can be found on our Programme guide. Download it
Bolehkah saya bekerja sambil belajar MBA: Can I work while pursuing the MBA?
Tentu saja! Jadual yang fleksibel kami d: Absolutely! Our flexible schedule is designed for busy professionals. Many of our students continue to work full-time while completing their MBA studies.
Berapakah yuran pengajian dan pilihan pe: What are the tuition fees and payment options?
Yuran pengajian kami kompetitif dan dire: Our tuition fees are competitive and designed to fit within your budget. (Pay per module).  We offer flexible payment plans to make financing your education easier. EPF/ KWSP withdrawal available.
